page.description: Methods available for object pointers (i.e. dot variables).

discussion.p: The object pointer may be referred to as *[xb:obj]]>]* in the object pointer method documentation. To call methods on an object pointer, replace the *[xb:obj]* placeholder with the name of the object pointer variable in your code. For example:

p.example:
dim myObj as p myObj.x = 12 myObj.y = 17
dim xVal as N
xVal = myObj.data("x")
